duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain the integrated Medical strategy for the Molecular Residual Disease product area to support growth of the Precision Oncology business.
Lead a team of medical strategy specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Ensure that the integrated Medical strategy remains current and is reflective of new developments and/or emerging business decisions.
Facilitate and plan annual Medical Innovation and Ideation sessions; lead the development and socialization of a read-out with key takeaways.
Track and provide regular status updates on objectives and key results (OKRs) linked to the integrated Medical strategy.
Successfully launch and implement key initiatives outlined in the integrated Medical strategies.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in a field related to the essential duties (M.D., Pharm.D., Ph.D. preferred)
